welcome.description: At El Bethel Assemblies of God Dortmund, we are a Spirit-led family devoted to worship, prayer, and encountering the power of God in everyday life. We believe the same God who performed miracles in the Bible continues to bring healing, deliverance, and hope today, transforming lives through faith and the guidance of the Holy Spirit.

sunday-worship.title: Sunday Worship Service
sunday-worship.description: Experience a beautiful Sunday by praising and worshipping God with us at El Bethel AG church as a family. ‘Worship’ seasoned with the powerful and undeniable presence of the Holy Spirit and the life changing ‘Word’ is a wonderful way to begin your week. Meet and fellowship with other members of our Church and you will be amazed to find out how much you belong here. If you’ve never visited us before, we’d love to have you over!

prayer-service.title: Prayer Meeting
prayer-service.description: Experience the power of prayer at our Prayer Service at El Bethel AG church. As a family, we come together to lift our hearts to God, trusting Him to move in our lives. In this Spirit-filled atmosphere, peace is restored, burdens are lifted, and strength is renewed. Prayer not only draws us closer to God but also to one another. Whether it’s your first time or you’ve been before, we warmly welcome you come and see how prayer can transform your life!

bible-studies.title: Bible Studies
bible-studies.description: Discover the timeless truth and transforming power of God’s Word through our weekly Bible Studies at El Bethel AG Church. Together, we dive deep into Scripture to understand God’s heart, strengthen our faith, and apply His Word to our daily lives. Whether you’re new to the Bible or have studied it for years, you’ll find encouragement, insight, and fellowship in a loving community that grows together in Christ. Come ready to learn, share, and be renewed by the wisdom and presence of the Holy Spirit.

midnight-service.title: Midnight Service
midnight-service.description: Experience a powerful encounter with God at our Midnight Service at El Bethel AG church, held on the last Friday of every month. Join us as a family for worship, prayer, and the life changing Word in the presence of the Holy Spirit. This sacred time is perfect for reflection, renewal, and breakthroughs. Meet and fellowship with other members you’ll be amazed at how much you belong here. If it’s your first time, we’d love to welcome you!

church.title: More than a church we’re a family in Christ

series.title: Shape Your Life with the Words of Life

subscribe.text: Never miss a message. Subscribe to our YouTube and Podcast channels.

logo.title: El Bethel Assemblies of God Dortmund
logo.subtitle: Dortmund, Germany

footer.description: El Bethel AG is a church that loves God and serves people, a place where lives are transformed by God’s Word, and a house of worship and prayer where His presence dwells.
